comment: KJV = Perversion Yes.....even your pet Bible. Lol. "YHWH" doesn't mean Lord, "Adonai" does. Jesus didn't lead the church out of the wilderness, Joshua did. "Sabbaton" doesn't mean week, it means "seventh day/Sabbath" The list goes on and on. Study a parallel format with an interlinear translation. Never trust the king's men.
